metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17452 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before11.1.7, 11.2.x before 11.2.4, and 11.3.x before 11.3.1. There isServer-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) via a loopback address to thevalidate_localhost function in url_blocker.rb.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
